contactCta.title: Let's Build Something Great
contactCta.description: Have a project in mind? Let's discuss how I can help bring your ideas to life.

about.title: About Omar
about.summary: I'm a full-stack engineer based in Sfax, Tunisia, specializing in building high-performance SaaS applications and web platforms. With expertise across the entire stack—from Flutter mobile apps to React frontends and Node.js backends—I deliver end-to-end solutions that scale.

items.title: Freelance Full-Stack Developer
items.description: Building custom web and mobile applications for international clients.

items.title: Full-Stack Developer at Tekab
items.description: Developed enterprise CRM solutions using Vue.js, Nest.js, and Prisma.

items.title: Full-Stack Developer
items.description: Created multiple SaaS products and marketplace platforms.
